item.title: 26 Jul 2025 21:30
item.description: Setup these three meshtastic T1000-E radio’s today. Amazed at how tiny yet powerful these are. They seem to last for about three days with GPS and telemetry on. Until Meshtastic enables all the sensors I might probably box these up. In a pinch these can always be used for mesh’d comms if needed. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: Setup these three meshtastic T1000-E radio’s today. Amazed at how tiny yet powerful these are. They seem to last for about three days with GPS and telemetry on. Until Meshtastic enables all the sensors I might probably box these up. In a pinch these can always be used for mesh’d comms if needed. ðŸ”—
